thread.section_title: Life Style Sports Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Life Style Sports | lifestylesports.com
thread.title: Trish
thread.title_full: Life Style Sports reviewed by Trish

author: Trish
title: Trish
text: For first time online purchase with Life Style Sport, I was 100% happy with products and would have been equally so with delivery but disappointed it seems it could only be delivered to nearest store and not directly to my home. However receptionist in Patrick St., Cork, was extremely helpful when I phoned to ask about collection. Overall, would use service again.
